name: ExpandableCalendar
note: This component should be wrapped with `CalendarProvider` component.

props.name: initialPosition
props.description: The initial position of the calendar ('open' | 'closed')

props.name: onCalendarToggled
props.description: Handler which gets executed when the calendar is opened or closed

props.name: disablePan
props.description: Whether to disable the pan gesture and disable the opening and closing of the calendar (initialPosition will persist)

props.name: leftArrowImageSource
props.description: The source for the left arrow image

props.name: rightArrowImageSource
props.description: The source for the right arrow image

props.name: allowShadow
props.description: Whether to have shadow/elevation for the calendar

props.name: disableWeekScroll
props.description: Whether to disable the week scroll in closed position

props.name: openThreshold
props.description: The threshold for opening the calendar with the pan gesture

props.name: closeThreshold
props.description: The threshold for closing the calendar with the pan gesture

props.name: closeOnDayPress
props.description: Whether to close the calendar on day press
